routines: social gatherings at BBQs and restaurants

He appears open to new experiences, often frequenting technology stores and modern establishments during his outings. Social gatherings are important to him, as evidenced by his repeated visits to BBQ events, which indicate a preference for community and connection with friends. In the future, he may explore new technology shops, local parks for outdoor activities, and culinary venues to enhance his leisure experiences.
